# Plugin hellokt (Hello Kotlin)

![](http://dev.lutece.paris.fr/plugins/plugin-hellokt/images/kotlin.png)

## Introduction

This plugin is a demo of an "Hello World!" plugin written in [Kotlin progamming language](https://kotlinlang.org/)
